item.title: Client Button help please

item.description:
@whetstoa wrote:

ok, so i’m wanting to change the area of the clickable tab, or other words shrink it down to the left a bit. I’m wondering what characters i would need to experiement with in order to change this. Thanks everyone.

if (messagesTab == 0)
i = GameImage.convertRGBToLong(255, 200, 50);
if (anInt952 % 16 > 15)
i = GameImage.convertRGBToLong(255, 50, 50);
gameGraphics.drawText(“All Messages”, 38, windowHeight + 7, 0, i);
i = GameImage.convertRGBToLong(200, 200, 255);
if (messagesTab == 1)
